name: Puzzle Challenge: Crosswords and More!
description:
Give your mind something to chew on.

The Puzzle Collection contains over 1000 unique word and logic puzzle games arranged in an easy to use format, providing over 200 hours of game play. Full of puzzles and brain teasers to entertain and challenge all word puzzle lovers! Have fun while engaging your mind in well crafted word exercises. Multiple player profiles – so the entire household can play. "Game sharing" via wireless connection with one download for the PSP® system. Variety of word puzzles to choose from – including: crossword, logic, brain teasers and more.

To download a .pdf copy of the game manual to your PC, go to:
http://cravegames.com/games/PuzzleChallenge/documents/PuzzleChallenges_PSP_Manual.pdf
